subject: Follow-Up on Overdue Affiliate Payment.
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Affiliate Team,

I hope you’re doing well.

I’m reaching out once again regarding my pending affiliate payment.
According to my records, there is still a remaining balance of $75.80 that
has not yet been issued, and the payment is now past the expected
processing time.

I understand that delays can happen, and I truly appreciate the work your
team manages on a daily basis. However, I would be grateful if you could
help check on this matter and process the remaining payment at your
earliest convenience.

Thank you very much for your attention and support. I look forward to your
confirmation.

Best regards,

David Long
